alert.note: Alert for Northampton (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 7:26PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Northampton County through 815 PM EDT... At 726 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Rich Square, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph, heavy rain, and frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Reduced visibility and minor flooding possible. Frequent cloud to ground lightning strikes. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Rich Square and Woodland around 815 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Eagletown, Milwaukee, Boones Crossroads, George, Potecasi, Creeksville, Lasker, Jackson, Bryantown and Falsons Old Tavern. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Be prepared for rapid changes in weather and road conditions. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
